answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC. If you need a copy of your immunization records, read tips for locating immunization records.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.

If you need a copy of your immunization records, read tips for locating immunization records.
Immunization Nurse
question: is there a central source for records of what vaccinations one has had?
question_variation_1: records vaccination vaccinations one has had
